game.title: Slaying the Jabberwock
game.description: The Jabberwock is a fearsome creature that has been terrorizing the countryside. It must be stopped.

task.description: The Jabberwock is said to live in a cave in the Dark Forest.
Be careful - the Jabberwock is a mighty creature.

task.objective: Return to King Oberon with the Jabberwock's head.
task.description: King Oberon will be grateful for your help.
